setting.value:
We just wanted to take this opportunity to wish a very [B][COLOR white]Merry Christmas[/COLOR][/B] and [B][COLOR white]Happy Hannukah[/COLOR][/B] to all of our fans!
If anyone in your family wants to easily get started with Kodi, FreeTelly can be installed to any Windows or Mac computer in a matter of seconds: [B][COLOR white]https://www.tvaddons.ag/freetelly-launch/[/COLOR][/B]
It is our sincerest hope that everyone on earth celebrates with peace, safety, and good fortune throughout this holiday.
PS: If you gifted a Kodi device, show them how to use it!
